name: Alien Adam
description:
Description

After God created this new random generated world and added life to it, he felt there was something missing. That's why he created Alien Adam to inhabit this new planet. Collect all 50 tasty fruits and murder the angry elephants in: Alien Adam

Controls - Keyboard:

  • WASD to move
  • Move mouse to look around
  • Press space to jump (hold to jump longer; press again for a double-jump)

Credits

I used some assets from http://opengamerart.org for audio because i'm neither an audio designer nor a music producer:

Ingame Music: "Jump Higher Run Faster (Jump & Run Miniboss Mix)" by Bart Kelsey licensed CC-BY 3.0: https://opengameart.org/content/jump-higher-run-faster-jump-run-miniboss-mix

Main Menu Music: "Jump and Run - Tropical Mix" by Bart Kelsey licensed CC-BY 3.0: https://opengameart.org/content/jump-and-run-tropical-mix

Sound Effects: "JBM Sound effects pack 1" by Johan Brodd licensed CC-BY 3.0: https://opengameart.org/content/jbm-sound-effects-pack-1

Everything else was made by myself.
